faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here are some frequently asked questions to help you better understand Babyzzu. If you have any questions, please contact us.

1.question: What is Babyzzu?
1.answer: Babyzzu is a platform that allows you to create personalized pages for special people. You can add photos, messages, and track the time of your relationship.

2.question: How can I create a personalized page on Babyzzu?
2.answer: To create your personalized page, follow the steps by completing the form with the requested information. After completion, you'll be directed to payment.

3.question: What's included in my personalized page?
3.answer: Your personalized page will include everything you enter in the form, depending on the chosen plan.

4.question: How do I receive my personalized page after payment?
4.answer: After payment confirmation, you'll receive a QR code and link via email to share and access your page.

5.question: Does the personalized page expire?
5.answer: Yes, in the basic plan, the page will be available for 1 year. In the advanced plan, the page is lifetime.

6.question: How long does it take to receive the QR Code by email?
6.answer: Payments with Credit Card & PIX are processed immediately.

content.introduction_description: Your privacy is extremely important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when using our platform.
content.information_we_collect: We collect the following information when using our platform:
content.registration_info: • Registration Information: Name, pregnancy start date, birth date, personalized message, pregnancy photos, child photos, and email address.
content.payment_info: • Payment Information: The email registered with Stripe or Pagar.me / Stone to process payment and send the personalized page link.
content.use_payment_process: • Process payment and send the personalized page link via email.
content.use_personalize_page: • Personalize and create the pregnancy page with the provided information.
content.use_improve_service: • Improve our services and customer support.
content.sharing_information: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except when necessary to process payments (Stripe and Pagar.me / Stone) or as required by law.
content.security_description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no internet data transmission is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
content.data_retention_description: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, or as required by law.
content.your_rights_description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, contact us at: contact@babyzzu.com.
content.changes_to_policy_description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. When we do, the 'last updated' date at the top of this page will be changed. It is your responsibility to review this policy periodically to stay informed about possible changes.
content.contact_description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: contact@babyzzu.com.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the platform. Last updated: 09/01/2024

content.acceptance_description: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use the platform.
content.service_description: Babyzzu offers a service that allows couples to create a personalized page by completing a form with names, birth date, pregnancy start date, a special message, and up to 4 media items per category. After completing the form, the couple is directed to payment and, upon completion, receives a link with a QR Code sent by email.
content.registration_and_security: To use our services, you must provide a valid email address. We will not share your email with third parties.
content.privacy_policy: We value your privacy. Your data will not be processed or sold to third parties. The provided email will be used exclusively to send your personalized page link.
content.user_content: You are solely responsible for the content you enter on the platform, including photos, messages, and information about the pregnancy and baby. We are not responsible for inappropriate or illegal content uploaded by users.
content.payments_refund_policy: Payments are processed through Stripe and Pagar.me / Stone. After payment confirmation, the responsible party will receive a link to access the personalized page via email. Refunds are not offered, except in exceptional cases, at our sole discretion.
content.service_changes: We are committed to keeping the service available during the contracted period, according to the chosen plan (basic or advanced plan). However, in extraordinary situations, such as technical, legal, or financial issues, we reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service. In case of discontinuation, we will notify users in advance and seek to offer suitable alternatives whenever possible. Babyzzu is not responsible for losses resulting from modifications or interruptions in extraordinary circumstances, but we will make efforts to minimize impacts.
content.limitation_of_liability: We will not be liable for indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages related to the use or inability to use the platform.
content.terms_update: We may revise these Terms of Use periodically. When we do, we will update the 'last updated' date at the top of this page. It is your responsibility to review the Terms of Use periodically to stay informed about possible changes.
content.contact: If you have questions about the Terms of Use, contact us at: contact@babyzzu.com
